option.name: Use C preprocessor (-x assembler-with-cpp)
option.tip: The file will be pre-processed before being passed to the assembler

option.name: Assembler Flags (-Wa,value,...)
option.tip: Options passed to the assembler (may be separated by commas)

option.name: Place each function in own section (-ffunction-sections)
Place each data item in own section (-fdata-sections)

enumeratedOptionValue.name: ISO C90 as modified in amendment 1 (-std=iso9899:199409)
ISO C11, the 2011 revision of the ISO C standard (-std=c11)

option.name: Place each function in own section (-ffunction-sections)
Place each data item in own section (-fdata-sections)
Linker File (-T option):
option.tip: Name of linker file (empty for none)

option.name: Generate map file:
option.tip: Name of map file (empty for none)

option.name: Linker File (-T option):
option.tip: Name of linker file (empty for none)

option.name: Generate map file:
option.tip: Name of map file (empty for none)

option.name: Display contents of the overall file header (-f)
Display object format specific file header contents (-p)
Display the contents of section headers (-h)
Display the contents of all headers (-x)
Display assembler contents of executable sections (-d)
Display assembler contents of all sections (-D)
Display the full contents of all sections requested (-s)
Display debug information in object file (-g)
Display debug information using ctags style (-e)
Display (in raw form) any STABS info in the file (-G)
Display the contents of the symbol table(s) (-t)
Display the contents of the dynamic symbol table (-T)
Display the relocation entries in the file (-r)
Display the dynamic relocation entries in the file (-R)
Display DWARF info in the file (-W[lLiaprmfFsoRt])
Decode internal names to user readable format (--demangle)
Display dynamic symbols instead of normal symbols (--dynamic)
File & line number for each symbol (--line-numbers)
